;$V2000G1000S793,446L10000
*define
nsa
caption "perseus for ONScripter"
menusetwindow 24,24,2,2,0,1,#BB8866
savenumber 15
rmenu "rmenu",windowerase ,"save",save,"load",load,"skip",skip,"lookback",lookback,"reset",reset
effect 2,10,1000
effect 3,3,500
effect 4,10,300
defaultspeed 10,5,1
transmode alpha
effectcut
globalon
dim ?1[9]
dim ?2[9]
windowback
humanz 30

textgosub *sys_first
pretextgosub *pretext
loadgosub *loadadjust

usewheel
maxkaisoupage 40
automode
automode_time 1200

;#sysnum
numalias back,11
numalias tag,12
numalias textwin,13
numalias scale,4000
numalias back_loop,15
numalias back_tmp,16
numalias name,7
numalias voice,8
numalias sel1,9
numalias sel2,10
numalias sel3,11
numalias sel4,17
numalias jump1,12
numalias jump2,13
numalias jump3,14
numalias jump4,18
numalias btnres,2

;#defsub
defsub movie
defsub name
defsub dwsa
defsub nend
defsub setwin
defsub voice
defsub textbtn
defsub cspchar
defsub cspnull
defsub cspeins
defsub cspzwei
defsub cspdrei
defsub cspvier
defsub cspsech
defsub cspsd
defsub cspmenu
defsub cspcsel
defsub cselect2
defsub cselect3
defsub cselect4
defsub endlog
defsub getldlocate
defsub movie
defsub vsp_btn0
defsub vsp_btn1
defsub vsp_name0
defsub vsp_name1
defsub vsp_csel0
defsub vsp_csel1
defsub textoff1
defsub name2
defsub namecl
defsub face
defsub lsps
defsub lspsr
defsub lspsy
defsub amsps
defsub amspsy
defsub wait2

;define_owari

game

*start

mov %tag,3000
mov %scale,800

;=======================================
erasetextwindow 1
rubyon

goto *mainmenu

;==========menucmd=============

*movie
csp -1
getparam $2,%2
saveoff
fileexist %3,$2:if %3=0 return
split $2,".",$1:add $1,"-"

mov %1,0:mov %4,7
for %0=0 to 999999
itoa $0,%0:len %5,$0:mov %6,%4-%5
for %7=1 to %6:mov $0,"0"+$0:next
fileexist %3,$1+$0+".png"
if %3=1 inc %1
if %3=0 break
next

mov %0,0
lr_trap *movie_end
bgmonce $2
resettimer
for %0=1 to 999999
gettimer %3
itoa $0,%1*%3/%2:len %5,$0:mov %6,%4-%5
for %7=1 to %6:mov $0,"0"+$0:next
if %3>=%2 break
bg $1+$0+".png",1
;btndef $1+$0+".png":blt 0,0,800,600,0,0,800,600
next
goto *movie_end2

*movie_end
if %0>0 break:next
*movie_end2
lr_trap off
;ofscpy
bg black,1:stop
return

*cspchar
for %0=31 to 36
csp2 %0
next
return

*cspnull
for %0=31 to 37
csp2 %0
next
return

*cspeins
for %0=31 to 37
csp2 %0
next
return

*cspzwei
for %0=38 to 44
csp2 %0
next
return

*cspdrei
for %0=45 to 51
csp2 %0
next
return

*cspvier
for %0=43 to 45
csp2 %0
next
return

*cspsech
for %0=46 to 48
csp2 %0
next
return

*cspsd
for %0=46 to 50
csp2 %0
next
return

*cspmenu
for %0=4 to 9
csp %0
next
return

*cspcsel
for %0=23 to 31
csp %0
next
return

*vsp_name0
vsp 0,0
vsp 1,0
vsp 2,0
return

*vsp_name1
vsp 0,1
vsp 1,1
vsp 2,1
textshow
return

*vsp_csel0
for %0=23 to 31
vsp %0,0
next
return

*vsp_csel1
for %0=23 to 31
vsp %0,1
next
return

*endlog
for %0=4 to 23
csp %0
next
print 1
texton
return

*dwsa
dwavestop 0:dwavestop 1:dwavestop 2:dwavestop 3:dwavestop 4
return

*name
getparam $1
len %1,$1
mov %2,217-7*%1
erasetextwindow 0
lsp 0,":s/23,23,2,2;#FFFFFF$1",100,315
print 1
return

*textoff1
textoff
erasetextwindow 0
csp 0:csp 1:csp 2
erasetextwindow 1
return

*nend
erasetextwindow 0
csp 0:csp 1:csp 2:print 1:dwavestop 0
erasetextwindow 1
return

*setwin
textoff
setwindow3 50,340,32,3,19,19,1,2,10,1,1,":a;sys/msgPanel.png",0,283
!sd
return

*voice
getparam $1
isskip %0
if %0=1 return
dwavestop 0
dwave 0,"voice/"+$1+""
return

*textbtn
return

*face
getparam $1
lsp 2,"image/"+$1+".png",0,229
print 1
return

*lsps
getparam %19,$3,%20,%21
lsph %19,$3,0,0,0
getspsize %19,%7,%8
csp %19
mov %20,%20+%7/2+1
mov %21,%21+%8/2+1
lsp2 %19,$3,%20,%21,100,100,0
return

*lspsr
getparam %19,$3,%20,%21
lsph %19,$3,0,0,0
getspsize %19,%7,%8
mov %20,%20*62/100
mov %21,446- %8/2
csp %19
lsp2 %19,$3,%20,%21,100,100,0
return

*lspsy
getparam %19,$3,%20,%21
lsph %19,$3,0,0,0
getspsize %19,%7,%8
mov %20,%20*62/100
mov %21,%8/2
csp %19
lsp2 %19,$3,%20,%21,100,100,0
return

*amsps
getparam %19,%20,%21,%22
getspsize %19,%7,%8
mov %20,%20+%7/2+1
mov %21,%21+%8/2+1
amsp2 %19,%20,%21,100,100,0,255
return

*amspsy
getparam %19,%20,%21,%22
getspsize %19,%7,%8
mov %20,%20*62/100
mov %21,%8/2
amsp2 %19,%20,%21,100,100,0,255
return

*wait2
getparam %1
isskip %0
if %0=1 return
delay %1
return

;=syscus==================

*loadadjust
dec %tag
setwindow3 50,340,32,3,19,19,1,2,10,1,1,":a;sys/msgPanel.png",0,283
!sd
return

*pretext
gettag $0
split $0,"|",%1,$name,$voice
if %1 == 1 inc %tag:mov $%tag,$0
if $voice != "" voice $voice
if $name != "" name $name
if %tag = 3049 mov %tag,2999
return


*sys_first
erasetextwindow 0
*sys_btn

btndef clear


textbtnwait %0
if %0=0 goto *sys_end
if %0=-1 gosub *rmenu_first:goto *sys_btn
if %0=-2 vsp_name0:gosub *back_first:vsp_name1:goto *sys_btn
if %0=-3 goto *sys_end

goto *sys_btn

*sys_end
vsp_name1
texec
;isskip %0
;if %0 != 1 repaint
saveon
erasetextwindow 1
return

;=======================================

*rmenu_first
texthide
vsp_name0
btndef clear
lsp 4,":s/20,20,0,2;#FFFFFF#5353C2读取进度",630,340
lsp 5,":s/20,20,0,2;#FFFFFF#5353C2保存进度",630,360
lsp 6,":s/20,20,0,2;#FFFFFF#5353C2返回标题",630,420
lsp 7,":s/20,20,0,2;#FFFFFF#5353C2游戏快进",630,380
lsp 8,":s/20,20,0,2;#FFFFFF#5353C2剧情回顾",630,400
lsp 9,":s/20,20,0,2;#FFFFFF#5353C2X",720,420
print 1

*rmenu_btn
spbtn 4,4
spbtn 5,5
spbtn 6,6
spbtn 7,7
spbtn 8,8
spbtn 9,9

btnwait %0
if %0=-1 cspmenu:vsp_name1:return
if %0=-2 cspmenu:gosub *back_first:vsp_name1:return
if %0=-3 cspmenu:vsp_name1:return
if %0=4 cspmenu:vsp_name0:print 1:gosub *load_first:vsp_name1:return
if %0=5 cspmenu:vsp_name0:print 1:gosub *save_first:vsp_name1:return
if %0=6 cspmenu:vsp_name0:systemcall reset:vsp_name1:print 1:return
if %0=7 cspmenu:systemcall skip:return
if %0=8 cspmenu:gosub *back_first:vsp_name1:return
if %0=9 cspmenu:systemcall windowerase:vsp_name1:print 1:return

goto *rmenu_btn

*save_first
textoff
systemcall save
texton
return

*load_first
textoff
systemcall load
texton
return

;=======================================

*cselect2
inc %tag
btndef clear
texton
getparam $sel1,$jump1,$sel2,$jump2
lsp 24,":s/24,24,2,2;#808080#FFFFFF$sel1",200,65
lsp 25,"sys/SelectBLur.png",164,55
lsp 26,":s/24,24,2,2;#808080#FFFFFF$sel2",200,165
lsp 27,"sys/SelectBLur.png",164,155
print 10,300
saveoff
goto *csel_btn

*cselect3
inc %tag
btndef clear
texton
getparam $sel1,$jump1,$sel2,$jump2,$sel3,$jump3
lsp 24,":s/24,24,2,2;#808080#FFFFFF$sel1",200,65
lsp 25,"sys/SelectBLur.png",164,55
lsp 26,":s/24,24,2,2;#808080#FFFFFF$sel2",200,165
lsp 27,"sys/SelectBLur.png",164,155
lsp 28,":s/24,24,2,2;#808080#FFFFFF$sel3",200,265
lsp 29,"sys/SelectBLur.png",164,255
print 10,300
saveoff
goto *csel_btn

*cselect4
inc %tag
btndef clear
texton
getparam $sel1,$jump1,$sel2,$jump2,$sel3,$jump3,$sel4,$jump4
lsp 24,":s/24,24,2,2;#808080#FFFFFF$sel1",220,60
lsp 25,"sys/SelectBLur.png",150,55
lsp 26,":s/24,24,2,2;#808080#FFFFFF$sel2",220,160
lsp 27,"sys/SelectBLur.png",150,155
lsp 28,":s/24,24,2,2;#808080#FFFFFF$sel3",220,260
lsp 29,"sys/SelectBLur.png",150,255
lsp 23,":s/24,24,2,2;#808080#FFFFFF$sel4",220,360
lsp 30,"sys/SelectBLur.png",150,355
print 10,300
saveoff
goto *csel_btn

*csel_btn
btndef clear
cspmenu
vsp_csel1
spbtn 24,1
spbtn 26,2
spbtn 28,3
spbtn 23,4

btnwait %0
if %0=-1 vsp_csel0:gosub *rmenu_first:goto *csel_btn
if %0=-2 vsp_csel0:gosub *back_first:goto *csel_btn
if %0=1 dec %tag:cspcsel:print 10,300:btndef clear:mov $1,$jump1:return
if %0=2 dec %tag:cspcsel:print 10,300:btndef clear:mov $1,$jump2:return
if %0=3 dec %tag:cspcsel:print 10,300:btndef clear:mov $1,$jump3:return
if %0=4 dec %tag:cspcsel:print 10,300:btndef clear:mov $1,$jump4:return
if %0=7 vsp_csel0:gosub *back_first:goto *csel_btn
if %0=8 csp 8:vsp_csel0:vsp_name0:vsp_btn0:systemcall windowerase:vsp_name1:print 1:goto *csel_btn
goto *csel_btn


;=======================================

*back_first
btndef clear
mov %back,1
checkpage %1,1
if %1=0 return
vsp_name0
textoff
lsp 23,"sys/fadeBox.png",0,0,150

gosub *back_page

lsp 4,":s/24,24,0;#FFFFFF#5353C2↑↑",735,104
lsp 5,":s/24,24,0;#FFFFFF#5353C2↑",735,124
lsp 6,":s/24,24,0;#FFFFFF#5353C2↓",735,294
lsp 7,":s/24,24,0;#FFFFFF#5353C2↓↓",735,314
lsp 8,":s/24,24,0;#FFFFFF#5353C2X",735,360
print 1

*back_btn

spbtn 4,4
spbtn 5,5
spbtn 6,6
spbtn 7,7
spbtn 8,8

btnwait %0
if %0=0 endlog:return
if %0=-1 endlog:return
if %0=-2 inc %back:gosub *back_page
if %0=-3 && %back==1 endlog:return
if %0=-3 && %back!=1 dec %back:gosub *back_page
if %0=4 add %back,4:gosub *back_page
if %0=5 inc %back:gosub *back_page
if %0=6 && %back==1 endlog:return
if %0=6 && %back!=1 dec %back:gosub *back_page
if %0=7 sub %back,4:gosub *back_page
if %0=8 endlog:return
if %0=16 voice $15:gosub *back_page
if %0=18 voice $17:gosub *back_page
if %0=20 voice $19:gosub *back_page
if %0=22 voice $21:gosub *back_page
goto *back_btn

*back_page
btndef clear


if %back <= 1 mov %back,1

if %back < 5 jumpf
for %0=0 to 4
checkpage %1,%back-%0
if %1=0 dec %back
next
~

checkpage %1,%back;
if %1=0 dec %back:return

for %0=15 to 22;
csp %0
next

if %back < 4 jumpf;
checkpage %1,%back+3
if %1=0 dec %back
~

for %back_loop=0 to 3

mov %back_tmp,%back+%back_loop

checkpage %1,%back_tmp
if %1=0 break

getlog $1,%back_tmp

split $1,"(",$21,$22,$23,$24,$25
if $25 != "" split $25,")",$31,$32:split $31,"/",$33,$34:mov $25,$33+$32
if $24 != "" split $24,")",$31,$32:split $31,"/",$33,$34:mov $24,$33+$32
if $23 != "" split $23,")",$31,$32:split $31,"/",$33,$34:mov $23,$33+$32
if $22 != "" split $22,")",$31,$32:split $31,"/",$33,$34:mov $22,$33+$32
mov $1,$21+$22+$23+$24+$25

mov %1,80*%scale/1100
mov %2,(460-%back_loop*120)*%scale/1100
mov %3,15+%back_loop*2
strsp %3,$1,30,%2,30,4,19,19,1,3,1,2,#FFFFFF
mov %4,%tag-%back_tmp
if %4 < 3000 add %4,50
split $%4,"|",%0,$4,$%3
mov %5,%3+1
if $%3 != "" add $4,""
if $4 != "" lsp %5,":s/22,22,2,2;#FFFFFF#5353C2$4",60,%2-25
if $%3 != "" spbtn %5,%5

next

print 1
return


;=set_end==============================

cspchar
csp2 37
*mainmenu
lsp ":c;sys/fadeSwirl.png",0,0
print 1

bg black,1
csp -1
print 1
textoff
erasetextwindow 0
rubyon
mov %0,0
mov %1,0
bgm "bgm/BGM01.ogg"

lsp 41,"sys/topMenu0.png",0,0

print 10,1000


*mainbtn
btndef "sys/topMenu0Over.png"
btn 1,1065*62/100,33*62/100,200*62/100,40*62/100,1065*62/100,33*62/100
btn 2,1065*62/100,82*62/100,200*62/100,40*62/100,1065*62/100,82*62/100
btn 3,1065*62/100,223*62/100,200*62/100,40*62/100,1065*62/100,223*62/100
btnwait %0
if %0 == 0 goto *mainbtn
if %0 == -1 systemcall load
if %0 == 1 csp -1:bg black,10,500:stop:goto *L_K01
if %0 == 2 systemcall load
if %0 == 3 movemousecursor 540,383:systemcall end

goto *mainbtn

cspchar
lspsy 36,"image/BLACK.png",640,360
print 10,300
[1||]是久违地嗅到血味的缘故？我又做了那个梦。\
nend
[1||]冬天的病房。\
nend
[1||]手足变形，浑身是血的女人。\
nend
[1||]意识到事情已经过去，却仍然为当时的恐怖而颤抖。\
nend
[1||]回忆起触碰到身体的瞬间，足以叫人失去理智的剧痛。\
nend
[1||]不如说寻找安然无恙的部位方为难事――如此剧痛遍布全身。自那之后，我有一周以上的时间无法安然入睡。\
nend
[1||]虽说这是自由的代价――\
nend
[1||]可是，我不想做这样的梦。\
nend
[1||]快从这梦中醒来。\
nend
[1||]有谁……\
nend
[1||ren-A01-0003]有谁……\

nend

nend
[1||]尽管外表以及言行没有任何变化，可自从我听到她说自己“成为了女人”以后，总会禁不住意识到恋是一名异性。\
nend
[1||]我知道这不是一个良好倾向――恋的小手冷冷的，其感触让我的大脑开始麻痹。\

[1||]一场幸福的梦。\

nend

[1||]再怎么说是超能力，这股力量也应该是人类所具有的一种能力――我在当时是这样想的。\
nend
[1||]这么一说，力量比我还要强的恋之前曾经向我提起，她只要触碰到别人，精神上的“痛苦”也会很自然而然地流入她的身体。\
nend

[1||]下午七点。\
nend
[1||]尽管只是祭典的前夜，村里却充满着活力。\
nend
[1||]从神社院落的高处向下俯视，只见村子的中心一带，正发出明亮的光彩。\
nend
[1||]屏住呼吸，尽可能不被人注意向前走去，途中与好几个村民擦肩而过。\
nend
[1||]每次与村民相遇，我都会挡住身体――不过，貌似大部分人都喝了酒，并没有注意到我。\
nend
[1||]现在，这种状况正好。\
nend
[1|【森　罗】|]「话虽如此……之前给急性酒精中毒的人使用力量，还真是够呛的」\
nend
[1||]回想起过去感受过的反胃感与酩酊感，我叹了口气。\
nend
[1||]我向目标地方走去。\
nend
[1|【森　罗】|]「菖蒲，会在么」\

nend
[1||]不过，毕竟不可能徒步离开村子，应该会赶上最后一趟公交车吧？\
nend
[1||]正因为这样想，我才会趁着夜色早早离开家。\
nend
[1||]要是她不在，我也可以等她来。再说了――\
nend
[1|【森　罗】|]「如果菖蒲不来，回家就好」\
nend
[1||]我这般嘟囔道――其中有一半是我的愿望。\
nend
[1||]心里想着，菖蒲之所以没有告诉我时间，兴许并不是真的打算出逃――\
nend
[1||]就算不是那样，菖蒲也可能放弃出逃的计划，让我在夜里的路边空等一场――\

[1||]我拥有缓和透香那股剧痛的能力。\

[1||]我们兄妹生来便拥有的力量。\

[1||]一直以来被周围的人强迫使用这股力量。\
nend
[1||]与透香初次相遇时，通过这股力量而得知透香的痛楚。\
nend
[1||]与透香成为朋友以来，一直使用力量，将疼痛转移到自己身上。\
nend
[1||]所有事情都坦白完毕，现在的我只能等待。\
nend
[1|【森　罗】|]「…………」\
nend
[1||]尽管只能等待……却很是害怕。\
nend
[1||]就在我说话的时候，透香却没有插过一次嘴。\
nend

nend

nend

[1||]今天是第一次负责值日，打扫卫生。校舍尽管老旧，却因为大家都悉心整理而很是干净，并没有花太长的时间。\

nend

[1||]即便这不意味着什么，也许，我能够使之有所“意味”。\

[1||]母亲的忠告。\

[1||]思考着力量的种种，浮现在我脑海里的，并非别人，正是“妹妹”\
nend
[1||]沸腾的大脑开始静静地冷却下来。\
nend
[1||]如果我选择某人――不管我选的是谁，所造成的结果，不正是对妹妹的抛弃吗？\
nend
[1||]就算我不这样认为，恋兴许也会这样觉得。\
nend
[1||]我必须保护好我妹妹。而，应该保护的人自然越少越好。\
nend
[1||]因为恋是留在这个世界上，与我相依为命的家人――\
nend
[1||]恋仍然没有回家――确认过这一点，我来到了和妹妹一同发现的花田。\
nend
